abstract.para: The mdadm enables you to manage RAID devices using CLI.

topic.para: mdadm is a CLI tool that enables you to create, edit or remove RAID devices.

note.title: Other possibilities to create RAIDs
note.para: You can also use &cockpit; to create RAID devices or you can define them in the first boot configuration that is applied during the deployment.

topic.para: To create a RAID device, proceed as described further. In the example, the RAID level 5 will be created.
Before you start creating the RAID, ensure you have enough devices for the RAID type you want to create.
